allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix artifact upload failure by removing colons from TestNG suite names

Changed all shard suite names from "Shard: X Tests" to "Shard - X Tests"
to resolve Windows file system incompatibility with colon character in
artifact paths. This was causing GitHub Actions artifact upload failures
across all 12 test shards.

Modified files:
- All 12 testng-shard-*.xml files in src/test/resources/config/shards/

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
